Content:: Harold "Burr" Davis (born c. 1937) was a Canadian football player who played for the Winnipeg Blue Bombers. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1959.[1] Delveaux played college football at the University of Houston where he won letters for his performance.[2] After his football career he coached at Klein High School and St. Thomas High School in Houston.[3][4]  This biographical article relating to Canadian football is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
